channel.title: [PI] Quest's help
channel.description: This problem is on-going with my Quests. I added this INT in player.java.. [code]public int grimPrize;[/code] but the problem is, if either during or after the end of the quest, the quest resets. Everything else works in the quest, but if you log out it always resets. How do I fix this?

item.title: [PI] Quest's help
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:12, topic:381767”][quote author=z rowt21 link=topic=477577.msg3495308#msg3495308 date=1297281717]

new playertokens are added in playersave.java

No shit dumbass i just wrote that above ya fuckin noob!!
[/quote]

i adore your 0 rep xD[/quote]
Yeah, I was going to say something about it, but I didn’t want to be mean.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quest's help
item.dc:creator: @z_rowt21 z rowt21
item.description:
@z_rowt21 wrote:

go to player.java and add the token number like so if your last quest code for char files is q15 then make a token in player.java q16
then go into playersave.java and search for q15 (if that is ur last quest in char file ) and add q16 token then save and compile

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quest's help
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“Lord Typhis, post:4, topic:381767”][quote author=relmitos link=topic=477577.msg3494338#msg3494338 date=1297192528]
Have it save to the character file.
[/quote]
How?[/quote]
I don’t know much about PI, but search in your files for character token. Add another character token. Like search for something like q15 as a token.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quest's help
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“Lord Typhis, post:1, topic:381767”]This problem is on-going with my Quests. I added this INT in player.java…

public int grimPrize;

but the problem is, if either during or after the end of the quest, the quest resets. Everything else works in the quest, but if you log out it always resets. How do I fix this?[/quote]

make every part of the quest save to the player’s save file by editting playersave.java , will take you a while , but meh
just make every part of the quest scan for and update in what part of the quest the player is…
like
public int questProgress = 0
player hasn’t started
questProgress = 1
player started the quest
questProgress = 2
player completed first part of the quest
questprogress = 3
player completed 2nd part , etc…

the last number will mean that the player has finished the quest , this is mainly how i plan to do it.

Read full topic
